original_text: The prophet Jeremiah said, ‘ Amen! I agree! I pray that the Lord would do that! I pray that what you have prophesied really happens. May the Lord bring back from Babylon all the valuable things that belong in his temple. May he bring back all the people that King Nebuchadnezzar took to Babylon as prisoners.
korean_text: 선지자 예레미야가 말하니라 아멘, 여호와는 이같이 하옵소서 여호와께서 네가 예언한 말대로 이루사 여호와의 성전 기구와 모든 포로를 바벨론에서 이 곳으로 되돌려 오시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: I pray that the Lord would do that
I pray that what you have prophesied really happens
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 예언한 것이 정말로 일어나기를 기도합니다

sentences.original_text: May the Lord bring back from Babylon
all the valuable things that belong in his temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 성전에 속한 모든 귀중한 것들을

sentences.original_text: May he bring back all the people
that King Nebuchadnezzar took to Babylon as prisoners
sentences.korean_translation: 왕 느부갓네살이 포로로 바빌론으로 끌고 간
